description: This file defines a 'RatingStars' component using LightningJS framework. It renders a star-based rating visualization with accessible label, displaying filled, half, and empty stars based on provided props 'value' and 'count'.

classes.name: RatingStars
classes.description: A LightningJS component that visualizes a 5-star rating with the number of reviews, including accessible label and star icons.

methods.name: safeValue
methods.description: Computes a validated rating value between 0 and 5.

methods.name: fullStars
methods.description: Calculates the number of full stars to display based on the rating value.

methods.name: halfStar
methods.description: Determines whether to display a half star based on the rating value.

methods.name: emptyStars
methods.description: Calculates the number of empty stars to fill up to 5 stars.

methods.name: label
methods.description: Generates an accessible label string that includes the rating value and review count.
